synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, filtrate concentrated to half of its volume
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: left at room temperature for seven days

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with [D6]acetone to remove residual water absorbed on the surface
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: removal of the solvent at low temperature (2â€“5 8C)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The water content was determined to be 98 % of the theoretical value by thermogravimetric analysis and confirmed by elemental analysis. Unwanted exchange of protons at C3 was observed when the sample of 1-D was prepared at room temperature with slow evaporation of the solvent.
